website_summaries.verdict: Everything you need in a combination lock times two. The best choice available for the budget-minded.
pros: Many high-end features for a great price
Easy to use and read, sturdy construction, and lifetime warranty
cons: Not the best choice for heavy-duty use, but a value option for most consumers' lock needs

customer_reviews.title: Impressive customer service
customer_reviews.text: if i could give 0 stars I would. I bought a two pack and neither of them worked! I was able to open them initially but once I reset the code neither the code I set nor the original code was working. I was determined it was my fault so I kept at it and googled videos and everything for a solid hour. Then my brother, boyfriend and step dad all tried and failed as well. I'm sending them back. Update: 7/16 the company sent me a new package of two prior to my return even being finished. And both locks work! I appreciate the great customer service so I’ve update to a 4 Star review.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Pleased user. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have no complaints! I love the idea of not having to memorize a traditional combination code or having to carry a key around you when at the gym. These are a nice alternative to the traditional combination lock. Fairly easy to set your code as well. And, you also get to pick your code, so it is far easier to never forget what it is LOL ,these are heavy locks that are so far, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Nice locks for the price. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a couple of these locks for the gym. For the price, they're a good value. Easy to set (the combination) and use, and they do the job. It's fairly sturdy and well-built. It's by no means a "premium" lock, but I don't need anything to keep wild beasts out per se. Initially, I received 1 defective lock in my 2-pack, but I reached out to Puroma, and they offered a refund or replacement. Since I do need the locks, I chose a replacement and they promptly sent it to me, no hassles. Awesome and friendly customer service. I'd buy from them again just because of that. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Solid basic locker lock
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with my purchase. I would certainly buy again for low level minor security. It is intimidating looking but I don't get the sense it would hold up to someone with basic tools trying to get into it. One recommendation I have is to align your numbers on the side like where the logo is instead of the edge. The edge is hard to see when opening from a locker. But I aligned my combo on the side with the logo and am happier getting into the locker.
customer_reviews.author: Feeder of Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Does not lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock does not lock! I just got this set a week ago, and just tried to use it. Setting it was a hassle, and when it finally accepted my code, I thought I was good. But, then I tried to use it, and it wont lock. I trued resetting it several times, and nothing. When turning the lock to reset, the numbers turn as well, making it impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Haimi

customer_reviews.title: Decent for locking crates
customer_reviews.text: I have 16 of these locks that I use on containers and crates. I need locks with the same combination and setting them has been fast and easy. I think they are good for what I am using them for. I have pulled on them hard and they stay locked, but I frankly doubt they could could take a whack from a heavy hammer or crow bar. But for the price no one should expect them to be that level of security. The thing I don't like about them is the black numbers on the chrome dials. They are not easy to read unless you get them in the light just right, thus the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Manley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction and durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these locks and at first I thought they were great but then one fell from the locker and the case bent, making the opening oval and preventing the shackle from fitting inside. It seems to me a metal lock should not deform from a fall of 3 feet. Next, the shackle of another lock started catching, making it a chore to place the lock on the locker and close it. I would not recommend this product unless the manufacturer addresses these issues.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Do not use these locks outside
customer_reviews.text: Do not use outside! We had these on our shed outside at our second property and after a year of it working fine, it somehow stopped registering our code and would not work. We were locked out of our shed until we got some wire cutters thick enough to break it off. I’d say it’s fine for inside. My son has been using the second one for over a year on his military locker and bags. I think weather messes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fallensavior

customer_reviews.title: easy to change the code
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered two of these locks. I didn't see any instructions, but i may have lost them. Anyway, i was able to figure out how to re-code the locks. The numbers are big enough and clear enough for me to see and turn without glasses (i like that). the lock is not super solid, but most locks if someone wants to break them they can get cutters if nothing else, so these are fine for what i needed (just locking some cabinets that have cleaning supplies in them). I will buy them again and i would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JI=3

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed .25" Shackle Combo Lock
customer_reviews.text: I found these great-looking combo locks to be easy-to-set and perfect for locking anything that can take a .25" shackle. They seem to be durable and quite resistant to cutting. If you have a Pelican 1170 case that needs to be secured, these locks fit perfectly - in form and function - as if they were made for this case! In fact, if you have a 2-pack of these locks, and are in the market for a case to use with them, you would do very well to buy a Pelican 1170 case to store some of those valuables of yours that you really want to keep out of the hands of "prying eyes!"
customer_reviews.author: Garthm

customer_reviews.title: ? Quality
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that customer service was excellent. I received my locks and only one worked. I alerted customer service and they immediately dispatched 2 new locks. However, once again, only one worked!! In the end I got 2 working locks, but that seems more than coincidental that 1 was fine and the other did not work in 2 separate shipments. Idk if anyone has had a similar circumstance, but I wouldn’t buy them again if I needed more. In general, they are easy to work and they feel heavy, not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: DCat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! They are a regular size - when I say regular I mean - close to the size of a normal lock. In the past I’ve ordered these from Amazon and I’ve received these tiny locks it look like something you’d put on a diary and we’re completely useless also in the past I’ve ordered these and I haven’t been able to set them and they’ve been completely useless this however was so easy to set and it’s so easy to open and I just love it I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: online-shopping-addict

customer_reviews.title: A good lock but NOT weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: Although these seem to be easy to use combination locks, I was very disappointed in the “weatherproof” claim on Amazon. Once you receive the packaging, there is absolutely nothing on the packaging indicating that these are weatherproof, and I wanted to use them outside. And holding them in my hand, it seems obvious that they will not hold up for long in the rain and elements. I’ve since purchased an Abus lock, advertised as weatherproof, and it clearly is. These locks should be used indoors only, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Padlocks -- but instructions are a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: These padlocks are very good, work well and fairly easy to read except at night (need a flashlight assist). The only issue I had was understanding the instructions for changing the code. The wording is not 100% clear, but the instructions can't be totally clear because the procedure for changing the code is a bit strange. Once you figure it out, they are fine. I use both all the time and am perfectly satisfied! Not only that, but a great price for 2!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Stick with a better brand name (M)
customer_reviews.text: Of the 2 lock pack, only one lock works. The tumblers are cheap feeling and bind up a little. The numbers are difficult to read unless you get the lock at just the right angle. This isn’t an expensive lock, so I guess one gets what they pay for. As for being an outdoor weatherproof lock, it feels too cheap to stand up to rainy, freezing, - Hot, damp weather for any prolonged period of time. I think there are better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Scottb630

customer_reviews.title: perfect for multiple same combo locks
customer_reviews.text: the locks were really simple to set custom codes. I use them in a storage shed that has 2 locks and i like the fact that you can set the codes to be the same so you don't have to learn multiple codes. I might purchase this for my parents storage and set the same code so all our sheds would have the same code. Hopefully it lasts through the California rain season when that comes around. Seems to be a great purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: A Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Very nice locks!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! We have only had these locks for a few days, but so far they have worked great! They are much easier to open than the standard padlock where you have to turn the dial one way, then the other.... With this one, you just turn to all 4 numbers and it opens. Very easy. My only fear is that people can see the code, but they would have to be looking very closely. Other than that, I really, really like these locks!
customer_reviews.author: ER Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Well made, durable, easy to program.
customer_reviews.text: These locks are easy to program and are very simple to use. The instructions are clear and they seem very durable. We use them for some lockers we bought for home personal use to help littler kids stay out of bigger kids stuff. So far they offer the level.of protection we need and even the 8 year old can operate them just fine. I would buy these again if I needed more I'm the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sonna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Easy To Crack
customer_reviews.text: I was able to apply down-force and relatively easily crack one of these. Full disclosure, I got these to add to my collection of practice locks to pick/crack. One thing I noticed is the code setting mechanism doesn't appear to be super reliable, and after setting a code it didn't work. This worked out though as I was using it for practice. I was able to crack it as a beginner after about 30 minutes. The successful code was totally different. At this point I guess I can at least say it's a decent practice lock, and anyone who watched a YouTube video and has enough determination can crack this lock without damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: where in bus

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive two pack
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy enough to keep out a motivated thief but perfect for my needs - just enough security to keep out "those meddling kids" ( a Scooby Doo reference). I am using them outside where they are exposed to rain and snow and have not encountered so much as a speck of rust over about a year. I do need a flashlight and my glasses, though to read the numbers when it's dark out.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Worm

customer_reviews.title: for my trips to the gym
customer_reviews.text: My gym stopped handing out keys for lockers and we needed to get our own locks. These are nice because you can set the combination to some 4-digit combination you can remember. They're not super heavyweight locks and could be cut easily (w/a bolt cutter) BUT I just need the lock to protect my clothing & phone while swimming at the gym. I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Nice Padlock for outside
customer_reviews.text: I needed a couple of padlocks for our fences which needed to be sturdy enough and to withstand the elements here in Florida. The locks came in nondescript packaging and had simple directions on how to set your own combination. It was easy enough to change. I will update this review again if the lock doesn't survive the rain and the heat. It looks sturdy enough!
customer_reviews.author: Hoonetic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these in different shaft lengths a week ago. Certainly easy to use. Instructions are simple, the dials are easy to see and rotate. We are using these outside on the barn and equipment. Let’s see how long they last🤪 Someone with a diamond Dremel tool could cut them in a few minutes, but let us hope that most thieves are not that organized
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Compact Combo Locks
customer_reviews.text: These are high-quality compact combination locks, suitable for a number of applications. I like the ease of setting the combo so they can other match or be different. The smooth operation of the numeral wheels makes it easy to unlock them. I plan to use these locks to secure my hand gun hard case for transporting it in my checked luggage on the airlines. These locks strike a nice balance between size and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D. Godbold

customer_reviews.title: It locks.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lock for my work and gym locker. Directions to create password were confusing initially but completed. I have been experiencing fussiness with the last digit spin wheel. If lock is relaxed and your putting in your code to unlock, the last spin wheel gets stuck every couple of twists. But if you push the entire set of spin wheels up into the arch, the issue resolves. Problem replicated in second lock.
customer_reviews.author: amyohno

customer_reviews.title: Lock 'em Up
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking units. Price is very good. These are not industrial locks, but would discourage casual/opportunistic intruders. The claim of waterproofness was a deciding factor in the purchase, but since they are new, we won't know for a while how that goes in outdoor service; materials appear to be consistent with that claim.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: One broke in a couple of weeks, and one will not open with programmed code :(
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my son's gym and band lockers. So much easier to use than standard combination locks! They aren't as heavy-duty, but perfectly sufficient to protect his gym clothes. UPDATE: Changed my rating to one star, unfortunately. One lock broke within the first couple weeks of school, and now the other will no longer open with the code we programmed. It worked all last year just fine; nothing changed - it just does not open any more. Not what I needed during an already-stressful first week of school!
customer_reviews.author: MacGyver Mom

customer_reviews.title: Combination compromised
customer_reviews.text: Only one combination lock work!!! Combination was compromised and had to cut the other. It was SET TO ZERO & couldn’t be reset to anything else. Too late to even get my money back. Although buying online is a convenience, I’m beginning to lose a lot of money on Amazon bcz you cnt get your money bck after a certain time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson ~ KaDell Essentials

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap, locking mechanisms won't hold
customer_reviews.text: Change the code on the first lock per the instructions, in the process the lock turned to some unknown combination and now I cannot open it. Changed the combo on the second lock and it held for a couple lock/unlock attempts and then it too moved one digit. Complete junk. Also I looks like they could be easily opened with nothing more than a large screwdriver ... very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Manu Muniz

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and locks solid
customer_reviews.text: I use one of these to secure my boat trailer to the truck, so I trust these with 20k worth of boat and gear. Never had any issue and the shank isn't even marked up from the metal on metal contact. The dials can be a little hard to see in bright sunlight but maybe that's my old eyes more than the locks' fault.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sollenberger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it is a pair. My son need one for his GYM; and i need one for my too shelf. The experience is that you must remember the lock # ; otherwise, it became useless. It is very different than the tradition one because all you need is a key to open it, and you don't have to remember the code you set it. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: cherry 95

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. Today when I locked it, one of the dials got jammed but loosened up when I scrolled it. When I went to unlock it, it apparently completely forgot my code (same code I’ve used for months). I had to hunt down the right gym employee who had to grab the cutters and cut it off. All in all it made me almost an hour late for work. I have no idea how a lock just forgets the combo but I would avoid purchasing this item if you’re looking for a lock that works
customer_reviews.author: Julie Timm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased 4 of these locks, was able to set my custom code without difficulty. When I needed more, I naturally ordered 2 more of the same with the intention of setting them all to the same code. I was surprised when one of the new locks would not open after being set exactly as I had set the previous 5. When I contacted Customer Service, they quickly responded with re-set suggestions which, unfortunately, did not work. To resolve the problem, they sent me a replacement package containing 2 new locks which functioned as desired. If I ever need any additional locks, I will have no hesitation re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to break the lock while changing the combination, ending up with a lock that can't be relocked (because the arm won't lift back up) or won't unlock with the correct code. I'm not use to treating locks as fragile. Make sure not to move the arm once it's locked in the tab for a conbination code change.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, nothing more
customer_reviews.text: The locks feel pretty cheaply made; however, I purchased these knowing it would not stop a serious thief. If you want a cheap solution to "slow down" or discourage theft, this is a solid option for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Great Locks Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered very quickly and packaged well, As soon as I opened it you can feel the quality and sturdiness. It is easy to read the numbers and works as expected. After I have some time with these locks I will update about the longevity. But right this is a great buy for the dollar $$
customer_reviews.author: PBrady

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget your four digit code!
customer_reviews.text: I hate the dial locks that are hard to figure out, so I was happy to receive these. They are quick and easy to use and only require a four digit code. Not only that, but the directions explain how to change the code again if needed, so if you’re worried that someone may have found out your code or saw you enter your number, you can easily change it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Grimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Lock for Extra Safety.
customer_reviews.text: These Locks are super easy to set a new combo and offer added security for your items. I'm using them as an added precaution for my ammo and firearm boxes. I bought these (along with a Red Sheffield Storage Box) and they were very easy to set with a new combo and provide an added layer of protection for your gun/ammo box. They are not very thick but are quite sturdy when locked. The combo keys are very easy to read and not too loose and not to stiff when turning.
customer_reviews.author: Dr_Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great lock.
customer_reviews.text: I use these two locks both for different purposes- one to lock a gate I share with friends and also as my gym locker. Both uses are great! The thickness was just right, not too bulky but shows its sturdiness. Very easy to set the combo. Also loved the color choices. Very vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Matt U.

customer_reviews.title: Study, safe, worth the money, trusted.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old went missing....(he was found) and I bought hasps and these locks for my backyard Gates along with other toddler proofing locks for the inside of the house.. the peace this gives me knowing he can't unlock it and get out again is more than anything I could imagine. It's sturdy enough that my eight-year-old son will shake, and kick the crap out of the gate to get it open and the locks hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great item amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Item was return due to defects. Customer service sent me a perfectly great item after a couple days without asking for another item. I appreciate the great customer service and prompt response. Wife love the item and works perfectly. She’s a nurses and needs a lock for her locker.
customer_reviews.author: Jam7

customer_reviews.title: I can’t figure it out
customer_reviews.text: The reviews said these were tricky but I thought I could figure them out. They seem to be good quality but they’re so difficult to reset. One of them got stuck while open and I don’t think I’ll even be able to use it anymore. Too much of a hassle to return so hopefully I can figure it out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Lies. The title lies.
customer_reviews.text: These are not designed for outdoor use. Do not buy these if you intend to use them outside. The title lied to you.
customer_reviews.author: JBA

customer_reviews.title: Great for work or gym
customer_reviews.text: Use this at the work and gym lockers and it attaches to my gym bag easily without me having to bring a key or remember a silly password every time. I can also share it with my husband because we can create our own unique password every time we use it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B Williams

customer_reviews.title: One lock did not work on first attempt. Right out of the package, it was useless.
customer_reviews.text: I just received a two pack of the Puroma Resettable Combination Lock and one Is non-functional. I was able to open them with the 0000 code. However after I followed the instructions and re-set the combination, only one lock would close. :(. Hoping the company will send me a new one. I am now adding to my original comment a few weeks later. I contacted the company and they sent me two new locks. Both locks are working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 of the package is 5 Stars - Updated
customer_reviews.text: One works fine. The second one in the package will not lock. Frustrating! Updated / customer service from the seller reached out via email and is sending a replacement at no charge. Leaving the review at 4 stars because it shouldn’t happen - but they handled this well all in all.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Krueger

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made light weight
customer_reviews.text: these are not really heavy duty locks they are very light weight and I imagine will not last thru the winter, I have them on my shed door, wanted a combination lock so I could access the shed at any time without having to run for a key. These serve my purpose, but will see how they hold up over the winter..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order this. The instructions were ripped upon arrival. One lock is faulty and cannot be used at all. The other is clunky. The wheels get stuck and it’s hard to make them turn. Spend a little more and get better quality
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Functional Lock, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Needed a simple combo lock for my kids to use at the gym. This one is perfect, with a four digit customizable code. Of eight I've purchased, one wouldn't lock after combo change. Could have been user error or product defect. Contacted company and got a response within 24 hours offering to send a replacement. New lock received two days later... free of charge. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sick
customer_reviews.text: Cool little combo locks that fit a standard wall locker. You can set the combination you want to use stupid easy, and you’re good to go. Only thing I could see as a negative with these is you have to have the combination lined up to lock it as well, then have to turn the numbers to lock it - so it’s not like a dial lock in the respect that as soon as you close it it locks again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOCKS FOR THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design and easy instructions make for a sweet deal. Came in 2 pack for $9.99. Very easy to reset combination and large numbers for those whowear glasses (like me). Combination wheels rotate easily and locking was positive and secure. Let my wife try to pick the lock and she gave up after many attempts. I would highly recommend these locks.
customer_reviews.author: Old Techee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have difficulties with some locks that don’t open when you turn to a certain number on the right then left. I sometimes lose keys to those that use them. This lock is easy to operate. The numbers fall into place effortlessly with a slight push of the thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are even better than similar locks I bought but couldn't find again. One thing I especially like is that there is a defined "window" where you line up the numbers. So, you don't have to remember how you did it last time. They work fine. Highly recommend. I use them to lock my fence gates.
customer_reviews.author: Kind consumer

customer_reviews.title: Wing an a prayer!!?
customer_reviews.text: Just received it nicely made. Easy to understand. Have not had time to see how secure it is . Will critique it when I’ve had time to test all aspects which will be soon!! Well had time to use it if you get the first three numbers the fourth is a shoe in (sure to get it) just hope their not smart enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: About town!!

customer_reviews.title: Fine..for the time being.
customer_reviews.text: These will work for the time being. Using them to keep my 5yr old out of my rifle case. They feel solid enough but I'm no lock expert and cannot say if this lock's design is standard; but end of the shackle opposite of the dials doesn't appear to get locked in place. The only thing keeping it shut is the portion that runs down through the dials. Again, they will work for the time being but I expect ill be upgrading in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Musser

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but adequate for the job requirements
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a 3 digit unit to lock my refrigerator from roommates, because the ones that came with were EXTREMELY cheap and easily defeated. Four digits make it very difficult to guess the code and has withstood being hamnered
customer_reviews.author: Yatzee

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years it became very hard twist the metal loop. Have to throw it away now. *Update* Puroma reached out to me and issued a refund. 5 star for customer service. I'm still using 1 of the locks so I've updated my review to 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This company is really terrific to work with! One of the locks in the set wasn't working correctly. They tried to help, but realized it must be defective. They quickly sent me another set that works just fine. I will order from them again if I have a need for more locks.
customer_reviews.author: DBB

customer_reviews.title: 1 works 1 wont
customer_reviews.text: These locks would be kool if they actually opened. I bought two sets and one from each set unlocks and the code can be set, but the others won't even open..the factory code doesn't work so I'm stuck with two lame locks
customer_reviews.author: O.DaGrouch

customer_reviews.title: One broke on first day
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happens, but one of my locks just broke on the first day. I was disappointed because of the quality. I did order another lock, so while I am waiting on another one to come, I am just using the second one. Maybe that is why it came with two. Guys buy one get one free is not so great after all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The locks I received were as listed and excellent for the needs I have. I was securing the gates to my back yard. These locks worked well and did what I wanted them to do. If you are looking for heightened security this is probably the lock to use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: One Is a Dud
customer_reviews.text: One was a dud. Thank God there's two. But one was supposed to be for a friend at the gym. Set both combos. Tell me why one works and the other is no locked shut.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Kurland

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not Light Weight or Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light weight gym locker lock to bring around for my travels but boy this is a bad choice. Right out of the packaging it's heavy, chunky, and the hinges look very filmsy. If you're looking for a light but sturdy lock like this, there's the Master Lock 653D Locker Lock.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Bob

customer_reviews.title: Toy lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke my son can break it, the materia is week and feels fake like the ones they have in dollar tree except the in dollar tree it cost one dollar and 10 cents for tax and here you like 10 bucks,jajajajajajaja
customer_reviews.author: Bobby V. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: Tried setting the code; worked once. Tried changing it immediately and the wheels would not budge. Could not change code and now it was stuck with some random code, as the wheels to set it didn't sit properly. Overall very flimsy design and its going back. Unusable lock.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to read the numbers!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these locks to replace our combination dial type locks. However, the numbers were impossible to see and I had to use a flashlight to see them. That was too bad because I thought they were going to be easier to use! I sent them back!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Poor design ineffective lock
customer_reviews.text: Great price but product has Lousy design. it requires rocket science to set the lock then the lock will not stay shut I’m returning the product as we speak. Yes the price for 2 is unbeatable but if it doesn’t keep what’s lock in your safe “safe” then it is essentially Economically ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: How to set lock; good product
customer_reviews.text: Good to use lock as long as you can set it right. The combo to unlock it is 0000. After that turn it counterclockwise to the left so that you are near the next whole and push down! Set ur numbers (look directly at the side) that’s the combo numbers. Finally turn it back. That’s it. BTW this lock is really good because if you don’t know the combo it will not lock at all what so ever! You have to put the write combination then lock it and then move the numbers. Hope this was helpful
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Faulty / damaged at arrival
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived but the lock that I did receive is damaged/faulty. It will not close and lock no matter how hard I attempt to push the lock into a locked position. These are cheap feeling. Do yourself a favor and buy a better quality product. Update: The company sent a replacement for the item and the replacement works. Appears it was faulty initial lock, hopefully the new ones work for a long time into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a month.
customer_reviews.text: One of the two locks broke after a month. I put the hook down to set the combination, it won't come back up to lock. It is stuck down in the set combination position. Now I don't trust the other one. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Design
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy design. Easily manipulated. Had to go on YouTube to figure out how to set it up. However, it does the trick. Use it for the lawn service people can get in and out of my gate without me physically being here to let them in. Doesn’t get used much..as I don’t use the gate so I can’t say out it acts after extensive use. Think it’ll be ok though
customer_reviews.author: Molock

customer_reviews.title: Portable & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and great for gym lockers. The instruction booklet clearly explains how to set your code and how to reset it in the future if you wish to. Perfect for carrying in your purse or gym bag. Would be great for employee lockers as well. It's not the sturdiest lock but it will keep your stuff safe from casual thieves.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Steckling

customer_reviews.title: Great Locks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these locks to use at work and at the gym. They were easy to set with any own chosen combination and I have been using them daily for several months without any problems. I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review for a product. But the service from Puroma staff demands that I respond. We've become accustomed to accept Amazon good product delivery as standard. But how do companies handle products which are flawed or where the purchaser has made an error in use. Puroma has only one service standard. Instant amazing response. They guide you. They respond and when the product has a problem has not performed perfectly...it is replaced. And there is continued follow-up. We expect this response from sales staff with expensive purchases. But low priced items. This is an unbelievable staff with a very good product. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bittar

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting after 4 months outside
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to set up but it is already rusting after only 4 months. It's supposed to be waterproof?
customer_reviews.author: Keryn’s Music

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid. These aren’t going to stand up to really serious attack but if you just need something decently strong to secure some kind of interior storage, they’ll do fine. Easy to set the combo, great price.
customer_reviews.author: B4E1

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses, with all my clothes locked away in the locker
customer_reviews.text: I used it exactly 5 times, and apparently that's all it was good for because the mechanism inside jammed up on the last number and wouldn't unlock. I could feel the tumblers try to disengage as I rolled over the last number but no amount of massaging would get it to release. I definitely didn't forget my combination. I sat there, dripping in my swimsuit for 10 minutes while my friends were waiting on me to go get tacos, and I had to hang my head in shame while I had to wait for the gym employees to cut it with the bolt cutters for me. Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: At first, the locks were working flawlessly and now after about 10 uses, one of them won’t open. I’m using the same combination as I have been using and it’s stuck. Now I have to go purchase some bolt cutters just to access my stuff
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: First item was defective. Replaced at no cost and works well. Great item and great seller!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED (1/10/19) After having an issue with one of the locks, I contacted the customer service for the seller and they immediately apologized and sent out a replacement item at no cost to me. I received the item and have been using it daily since with no issues whatsoever. It seems like the original item may have just been defective. As previously stated this is a great item (while it works). Easy to set up and even easier to use. The customer service is great as well. I am glad I gave this seller and item a second chance.
customer_reviews.author: chungachguk

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: I have these locked on our cafe cabinets and fridges at work and they are extremely sturdy and easy to use. Read directions for setting up very carefully, it took me a couple times. It’s great to not have to worry about a key anymore!
customer_reviews.author: NSN21

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These locks are garbage. One out of the two got jammed and wouldn’t work as soon as I tried it out. The other one got bent out of place as my locker got broken into. This cheap product was an obvious target for thieves. I would’ve rather purchased a single decent lock instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue setting the combination on one of the padlocks, and it wasn't working at all like the first one. I sent out an email that evening, not even sure if I would get a response. Well, I did... almost immediately. She ascertained that one of the locks was defective and sent me a replacement immediately, and then followed up a few days later to make sure I received it and it was working properly. Some companies still get it! Great customer service!!! Plus, it's a great little lock for using on my locker at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Seminole 93 99 13

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality, don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap quality and neither one of them works. Cant open with the default code nor can i set a code. Just wasted $ for me. Wish I hadn't bought these!
customer_reviews.author: JMo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: They work and there's nothing wrong with them as such, but they feel quite flimsy while locking and unlocking. For the price I doubt that will sway many, but I'll be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sanchit Batra

customer_reviews.title: Broken in the lock position
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lock for a few months. It’s been used a total of 7 times and it is now broken in the lock position. It was extremely annoyed to have to go out a buy bolt cutters to open up my locked belongings. Don’t waste your money. There is a reason this comes in a 2 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha F.

customer_reviews.title: Great service/good locks
customer_reviews.text: The locks seem to be good quality but I'm sure they aren't made for securing really valuable things. I just needed something for my shed and the gate on my fence. Had problem with one, they sent me replacement in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: They Word Fine
customer_reviews.text: The 2 combination locks I ordered worked fine and are going to be used to keep my things safe while at the gym. Our gym lockers are old and require a wide lock, these locks fit them just right. Now, I have an extra in case I leave one behind, which I did and the reason I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice locks
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty, probably overkill but great. I use for my gym locker and they work perfectly. Add a few extra ounces to the bag but they were a lighting deal and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Zigfried

customer_reviews.title: Good Combination Lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock is easy to use and seems sturdy. One of the locks got locked up, but we contacted customer service via email and they remedied the situation immediately. We were offered a refund or a new set. We chose the new set, and they sent it immediately. They then followed up to ensure we were satisfied with the replacement. It was a fantastic customer service experience!
customer_reviews.author: Ksdreher

customer_reviews.title: solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to leave a note to anyone who might be concerned over quality since this is not a name brand product, but I was very impressed with both the quality, weight, and medium size of these locks. They work great on my gym locker.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Work just fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because they require 4 numbers to lock. It is slightly annoying that you must hold both parts of the locks together while setting lock or scrambling it. I gave one of the locks away then lost the other one. Bought another set.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: 4 digits is nice, but the lock didn't fit my gym locker...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice enough lock, I like that it's 4 digits, vs most the other options that are only 3 digit combos; it's more secure. Easy to set, and feels sturdy. Unfortunately the part you'd slide through a school/gym lock didn't fit the locks for my situation. As such, I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: This lock does not work. When getting it set up to make a lock combination for my locker, it broke before I could even set a combination. The lock itself is very flimsy and did not seem secure enough as it broke while trying to make a combination. I would give this product a zero stars. The directions are very clear and seems easy to use however the locks and not seem to work as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best lock I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I hate using traditional locks but when I started using this I loved it. I use them for my locker at work and it has always worked and it’s a simple code that’s easy to remember.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy. I got these for my locker at work and it gets the job done for sure. I wanted a combination lock so that I didn’t have to carry a key around with me
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Zorotrian

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY  - Worse padlock you could buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a vacation I was going on. The first one malfunction and couldn't open within 5 days of light use. I used the second padlock for nearly a month of moderate use until it malfunction and wouldn't open. I had to have a hotel agent use lock cutters to remove it from my locker. DON'T BUY THESE CHEAP PADLOCKS. They work for a short time then they break.
customer_reviews.author: FEM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Read Numbers ✓
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to see the silver numbers on the black. Seems a bit lightweight so I will have to see how it last. It's for a dumpster gate at an office warehouse so will be used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty G

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽👍🏽 A must have
customer_reviews.text: This lock is so easy to set. I was able to set it and use it immediately. The numbers are large enough to easily read as well. Great buy! 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Gracefully Metal

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 out of 2 worked
customer_reviews.text: ~ only 1 lock worked : ( The other will not reset & is not usable. We have fiddled with the broken one many times, but decided it’s a hassle of time to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Resettable four digit lock
customer_reviews.text: Follow directions and they work well. I used this to lock a waterproof case and secure it to a wall anchor. This required a two lock setup. What I expected in quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Solojourney

product_meta.title: Puroma 2 Pack Combination Lock 4 Digit Outdoor Waterproof Padlock for School Gym Locker, Sports Locker, Fence, Toolbox, Gate, Case, Hasp Storage (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Puroma 4 Digit Locker Combination Lock is strong and built to keep your own belongings better and set your mind at rest while doing your sports or job. 
A special design of the combo side window provides you a clear view while setting your code. It can be resettable and 10,000 combination codes formed by 4 digit numbers make it safe for daily use.

Specifications:
Shackle size: 1/4 in.
Material: Steel and Zinc Alloy
Unit Dimensions:1.73 x 3.15 x 0.87 inches
Color: Black

How to set your own code?
1. Make sure codes are set to default (0-0-0-0). Pull up the shackle and turn it to the code setting gap.
2. Push the shackle down until the tiny pin is fully inside the gap. Hold it there and turn the shackle counterclockwise to the code line.
3. Scroll the numbers to set your own combination code, making sure the numbers are completely in the windows.
4. Turn the shackle clockwise until it pops up. Remember your new combination.

Note:
To avoid damaging the lock, it's NOT recommended to turn the shackle over the code line.
Please make sure the numbers are completely in the window when setting a new combination. 
Please remember your new combination code you have set.

Package Content:
2 * Combination locks
feature_bullets: Special Design: Compact size, light weight, and convenient for you to store and carry. Side windows for easy combination viewing.
High security : 4-digit offers 10, 000 combinations for added security compared with 3-digit. Set your mind at rest while doing your sports or job.
Resettable: Numeric combination design makes it easy to set and reset your own preferred combination and hassle-free to carry the key.
Widely use: Suitable for school gym locker, sports locker, fence, toolbox, case, hasp storage and etc.
Bonus: Package comes with 2 packs of zinc alloy 4-digit resettable BLACK combination locker locks. Ideal gift to your friends, classmates, and etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,711 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
